div.p: ANTONIO: Thanks for completing the questions. We will come back to the answers in a little while. For now, we're going to look at four phases of alcohol and drug use.
ANTONIO: We'll describe the characteristics of each phase, which will help most people determine fairly accurately which phase they are in.
ANTONIO: Some people may have unknowingly made high-risk choices and come close to, or even passed their trigger level, so understanding the phases of use can be life-saving information.
ANTONIO: It's important to keep in mind, not everyone progresses through the phases of drinking and drug use in exactly the same way.
ANTONIO: So, some people will be able to relate to everything we describe in a phase, but others might only relate to some of the experiences. Okay, let's get started.
